creator: gs-apache-dev@gluelogic.com
text:
With the recent hsregex problems on amd64 in Apache 1.3, it makes sense to add a
new category (32-bit/64-bit), or to add options to "Platform" to include AMD64,
IA64 in addition to "PC".  Probably also useful for PowerPC chips: G4, G5, and for
32-bit or 64-bit versions of Windows ("OS" category), etc.  Thanks.
